question: World Travel Market (WTM), a must to attend for travel and tourism industry is to be organized by which country in 2019?
explanation: The three day long World Travel Market (WTM) has been organized in London, UK. The theme for India Pavilion at WTM 2019 is ‘Incredible India – Find the Incredible India’. WTM is one of the must-attend business-to-business exhibition for the travel and tourism industry worldwide. In the last four decades, WTM has grown in to world’s largest Exhibition attracting over 5,000 exhibitors from 182 countries and regions and more than 51,000 participants.
